item.title: 3 Ways To Build Better Products By Embedding Security Into The Product Lifecycle
item.description: Imagine you’re overseeing the construction of your dream mansion. But at the last minute the planning officer comes round and says, “Nope, this doesn’t meet our planning standards. You’re going to have to rebuild the pool and the kitchen”. Suddenly, chaos and delays are the order of the day as you scramble to meet these last-minute requirements. You’re going to have to cancel your housewarming pool party!
